metadata.title: CVE-2022-4492 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: The undertow client is not checking the server identity presented by the server certificate in https connections. This is a compulsory step (at least it should be performed by default) in https and in http/2. I would add it to any TLS client protocol.

criterions.comment: undertow package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
